programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate's flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. One man fights with his girlfriend in a bathroom, another fights with his girlfriend at home, both are surprised they are arrested for domestic violence. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why he's been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a man is sent to a holding cell after hurling racial insults. In Reno, NV A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody for battery of a police officer. In Portland, OR an intoxicated eldery man breaks into song during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is charged with possession of a controlled substance. A woman denies assaulting her husband, and two aggressive cousins threaten police and end up in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Guards uncover grooming aids stashed in an unlikely spot while combing through a woman's things. An incarcerated tourist threatens to bring in Johnny Cochran for his defense, and a drunk driver awakens to find X-rated artwork drawn on his body.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought into the detention center hogtied. A disruptive teen is sent to a holding cell. Casino valets tip the authorities about an intoxicated woman leaving behind the wheel.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man tests officers' patience. A woman tries to deceive police with multiple identities. A one-legged biker shows off his balancing skills to officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman lies hobbled in the backseat of a patrol car after kicking the officer in the face. Officers struggle to control an outrageous man. Officers attend to a woman struck by a drunk driver.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An arrested man is caught on camera making a run for freedom. An addict returns to jail and tells officers that meth is controlling his mind. Humility may be the key for one man to quit his life of crime. A shoplifter calls 9-1-1 to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention. Twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police. A man in women’s clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is sent to intake for indecent exposure. In Spokane, WA a man threatening bodily harm to himself is placed in a restraining chair. In Salt Lake City, UT an intoxicated woman fades in and out of coherency. In Portland, OR an amputee is detained for dodging the subway toll.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A young father pulls a desperate double robbery to make ends meet. A routine shakedown gets deadly when officers uncover alarming contraband. An inmate plays innocent about her criminal past until confronted by officers. An antsy woman’s brazen behavior tests the patience of officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate goes on a rampage when he suspects police of losing his money. Officers have a tough time with a drunk man. An alleged prostitute is stabbed. A drunk trapeze artist takes a drive on his moped.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A secret stash is uncovered during a search at a suspect's property. Two rowdy inmates don't quite hit it off when they invade each other's personal space, and a jaywalker experiences problems keeping his pants from falling down.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for an open container of beer. In Salt Lake City, UT a woman is stunned as to how drug paraphernalia wound up on her person. In Las Vegas, NV a former bus driver relays sad details about his past. In Portland, OR a shoplifter receives some sage of wisdom from one of the officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers warn a man that dressing up like a clown in Texas is not a good idea. A shotgun is found in the hoodie of a man arrested for riding his bicycle without a headlight. A young couple wonders how pot ended up in their possession. Officers are surprised at the amazing amount of pot one can smoke.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A party of three girls are brought in after having been arrested for possession at a nearby music festival. Drugs are found on the person of a music festival attendee during intake. A slightly older party goer is taken into custody for possession.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A passenger allegedly attacked a cabdriver. A woman describes assaulting her boyfriend with hot food, and a mother is arrested for leaving her kids in a car while gambling.

programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.
